alert.note: Alert for Lake; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 7:04PM EST until January 05 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Patchy blowing and drifting snow in open areas expected, especially where a narrow band of heavier snow fell from west- central Will County to portions of central Lake and Porter counties in Indiana. West winds will gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Cook, Will, Lake IN, and Porter Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. This includes I-57 between Monee and Peotone and I-65 between Merrillville and Crown Point.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Indiana, the latest road conditions are available by calling 1-800-261-7623.
